present participle of
pester
to behave in an annoying manner towards someone by doing or asking for something repeatedly: At the frontier, there were people pestering tourists for cigarettes, food, or alcohol. [ + to infinitive ] John has been pestering her to go out with him all month. Synonyms
annoy
badger
bug (ANNOY) informal
